summary: This is a brief email correspondence forwarding a court order from the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit in the appeal case 20-2413, United States v. Maxwell. It indicates formal notification of the order to the recipients.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the appeal case referenced in the document title and email subject line (20-2413, v. Maxwell).

events.title: Court order issued in Maxwell appeal
events.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit filed an order in the appeal case 20-2413, United States v. Maxwell, and formally alerted the recipients.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a court order from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
The order pertains to appeal case 20-2413, United States v. Maxwell.
The communication serves as formal notification of the court's order to the recipients.
